name: reactivation_offer
description: Reactivation offer email template with personalized greeting, discount offer, pricing plans comparison, and CTA button. Features responsive design optimized for email clients.

samples.greeting_message: We noticed you haven't been with us for a while, and we miss having you in the conversation.
samples.offer_text: For a limited time, resubscribe and get
samples.plan_2_feature_1: Home delivery of the weekend edition
samples.plan_3_feature_2: Invites to subscriber-only live Q&A events
samples.footer_text: ©️ 2025 Email Design Insights. All rights reserved. You're receiving this email because you signed up for updates from The Daily Beacon
samples.exclusive_early_access_text: plus exclusive early access to our upcoming investigative series.
samples.welcome_back_text: We'd love to have you back
samples.supporting_message_text: Because journalism worth reading is journalism worth supporting.
samples.subject_line: We Miss You - Special Offer Just for You
